oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Grand Ole Opry - Prince Albert - 1957-01-05 - Part 1
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Part 1 of Prince Albert tobacco sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from January 5, 1957. Featuring Grant Turner (announcer), Webb Pierce (host/performer), guest performer George Jones, and regular performers Rod Brasfield, Chet Atkins, Minnie Pearl, and Grandpa Jones. Held at Ryman Auditorium, Nashville, TN.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Webb Pierce; Rod Brasfield; George Jones; Chet Atkins; Minnie Pearl
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Grant Turner introduces Webb Pierce -- I'm Tired (Webb Pierce) -- Opening statement (Grant Turner, Webb Pierce) -- Webb Pierce introduces Rod Brasfield -- Comedy routine (Rod Brasfield, Webb Pierce) -- Webb Pierce introduces George Jones -- You Gotta Be My Baby (George Jones) -- Prince Albert commercial (Grandpa Jones, Webb Pierce) -- Webb Pierce talks -- Sally Gooden -- Webb Pierce talks -- Mother Call My Name In Prayer (Webb Pierce) -- Webb Pierce introduces Chet Atkins -- Armen's Theme (Chet Atkins) -- Webb Pierce introduces Minnie Pearl -- Comedy routine (Minnie Pearl, Webb Pierce, Rod Brasfield) [continued in part 2]
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:subject: WSM (Radio station : Nashville, Tenn.); National Broadcasting Company; Grand ole opry (Radio program); Turner, Grant; Brasfield, Rod; Minnie Pearl; Atkins, Chet; Jones, Grandpa, 1913-1998; Pierce, Webb, 1921-1991; Jones, George, 1931-2013
